title: Tadej Pogačar hoping to end season on a high at Il Lombardia: ‘One of my favorite times of the year’
content:
After celebrating his 25th birthday, the Slovenian superstar wants to carry momentum into a Tour de France rematch in 2024 with strong season closer.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar hoping to end season on a high at Il Lombardia: ‘One of my favorite times of the year’ on Velo.
author: ahood
